website_summaries.verdict: If you have your heart set on a large-screen 4K TV, this Sony is worth considering. But it comes with the potential for a few quirks, and the picture quality isn't quite as impressive as others with UHD resolution.
pros: An updated smart TV by Sony with a spacious screen
HDR technology is great for gaming
Remote control works with voice commands and is easy to set up and use
cons: Not compatible with all popular streaming apps
Some issues with software updates have been reported
Contrasts, including black hues, aren't as defined as others in its class

customer_reviews.title: Subpar
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV to replace a 6year old Samsung 8000 series and I have to say I am highly disappointed. The picture quality is decent, but my Samsung has better overall picture. The black levels in this unit are terrible. Even tweaking the advanced settings did not improve much from the factory presets. I love that it is Android and the apps/apks are easy to load on it. The remote is the best feature. The voice remote is flawless, I love the responsiveness and accuracy of the remote.
customer_reviews.author: MR & MRs. KAOS

customer_reviews.title: A great tv a little late
customer_reviews.text: his tv has a great picture and wonderful sound. If there would be a problem it would be getting to the back to put in accessories (dvd player, etc) The picture goes completely all around the frame. It was worth the price. Don't expect this tv in 2 days with prime, It took Amazon almost a week to deliver it to me.
customer_reviews.author: boattrip

customer_reviews.title: Vertical banding
customer_reviews.text: After all these years of LCD manufacturing, why is it a crapshoot on getting a uniform large LCD screen? Been trying to put up with this vertical band left of center but panning shots, skies, etc, etc its too dang distracting. On images that are rich in content, indeed the pic is fantastic, until it pans and the dark band sticks out like sore thumb.
customer_reviews.author: sabasigh

customer_reviews.title: Light leaks for days
customer_reviews.text: Bought the tv and when it was delivered it had light leaks across the bottom. Contacted amazon and got a replacement sent out. The new tv looked good for the first 2 weeks. Then a string of bright white pixels ran up and down the right side of the screen. Looked like you slid over the black paper on a light bright. Sony, stop trying to make side lit led tvs. There is a way to seal them properly, but since you’re not following through, just stick to back lit. Warning, do not buy. Even if it looks good when it arrives it may deteriorate like mine did
customer_reviews.author: C. Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Sadly not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Waited a few weeks to see if anything would get better... and Nope!!! The apps don’t always load. Sometime when you switch from Netflix to TV you lose audio and must reset the TV. On black screens you can see the light spots all over. Gonna request a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: punx

customer_reviews.title: NO CHROME or FIREFOX - thus NO YouTube TV
customer_reviews.text: So frustrated...touted as a smart tv - can do anything - it can't. If you want to cut the cord and go with YouTube TV...you cannot! It only has its own browser. :( What a waste!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good, but not as good as I expected. I like Android TV, but probably due to the low memory or bad chip, it doesn't run smooth at all, besides the intelligent sound detection doesn't work well either, when I have output home theater running it often doesn't detect it but out put sound to both TV speaker and my Home theater
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: No black level!
customer_reviews.text: Run away and dont look back. No black levels, seeping white light from frame. Just get 900f so much better. If u are thinking about viewing angles its not that much better in 850 and u start from horrible blacks at 0 degrees anyway
customer_reviews.author: Siberian

customer_reviews.title: Returning after a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality (other than gaming) is terrible, I get the 4 white corners (specially on the top right corner) and cant get rid of it. Have try everything and couldn't fix it, sony said "is just how it is" Imposible to watch movies or shows with dark themes like "Sabriba"
customer_reviews.author: Osvaldo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Pic, lots of artifacts and grainy picture.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in the picture quality. I have a 4K cable box and a Sony 4K BluRay player. Even the 4K picture is pretty grainy with artifacts on the screen, particularly when there's small text on the screen over a moving background. Wish I got the Samsung. It does the job, but for the money I've seen better... Much better.
customer_reviews.author: ZackInMA

customer_reviews.title: Great picture & Service
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful &fantastic picture quality. Dish services Aaron&Kenny did great job mounting and installation.
customer_reviews.author: GRH Florida

customer_reviews.title: Died after 5 days. FIVE DAYS. DEAD. Updated - now Waiting a week and half for replacement. FML.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even make it an effing WEEK before it died. Dealing with Sony tech support now. This is BS. Sony is replacing with a new unit but this whole process will take a week and half it looks like. Maybe I should’ve gone with working the issue thru the reseller. Still such BS.
customer_reviews.author: RBGGGB

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to the haters
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit of a TV afficitionado and this tv is wonderful. Don't hesitate bc of people that slam it. It's awesome. 4k with a strong processor it gets bright and it gets dark enough people say looks gray that's just not true. It's not true black but still very black. The people that don't think it's black enough should of just got an oled anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Sowers

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but perfect picture
customer_reviews.text: It was expensive and the first one that was delivered was dropped by Amazon's delivery person and started having connectivity problems. After calling Amazon, they replaced the television and the second one, the microphone stopped working. So I don't know what the deal is with this tv, but it seems like there are just some electrical problems with it or something. The picture is beautiful and it was an upgrade from my Sony Bravia, but I'm just not sure the expense was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Certified Amazon Buyer who is Extremely happy with this Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This SONY 85” 4K UHD LED TV is “Awesome” I highly suggest and recommend that you buy it well worth the money! Recommend the expensive Sanus wall mount. Save money and buy together- Extremely adjustable and strong! This TV IS HUGE AND BEAUTIFUL! Was bought on Black Friday for $3,000 Very good bargain when on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Hydra-Dynamic

customer_reviews.title: Avoid.  Dead after 18 months, picture is only so so...
customer_reviews.text: After a year and a half the TV no longer turns on. Have tried the trouble shooting to no avail. For a thousand bucks, and a Sony name, I should have gotten more use out of it. When it did work, the picture was OK, but lots of distortions when the background was moving. picture couldn't keep up with the action. Remote worked, but then power button would stick down and cause problems.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Skip this 85 inch TV
customer_reviews.text: The 85 inch had dark and light areas the showed up with blue colors more. Called amazon and the connected me to Sony that sent out another TV and this set did the same thing. This is surprising that Sony would let this happen. Poor picture quality on a TV of this size and price is simple unacceptable. I called amazon again and requested a refund and returned. Amazon as always was very easy to work with, as was Sony. Unfortunately, I would not recommend this TV- see pics
customer_reviews.author: david Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Expected more from Sony!!!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Picture was not crisp clear. (Even after adjustments). 2. On/Off had a loud clicking noise. 3. Volume seemed to go from low to high during movies and commercials. (Even after adjustments). With the money I shelled out for this TV it was not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Review Time...

customer_reviews.title: Alexa sort of works. Amazon over selling the ability of the TV
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware the ability to work with Alexa is a joke. If the TV is off for more than 8 hours it does not respond to a wakeup. Amazon knows this and says they are working on it. Really? Since Nov 2018
customer_reviews.author: beachfun

customer_reviews.title: Great Sony TV!
customer_reviews.text: The TV arrived on time....guys set it up, no problems. Very happy with the TV.....great picture....only wish Directv had more 4K content. Other than the TV required a Premium HDMI cable to be recognized and work with Directv's 4K equipment.....otherwise I had zero problems with the TV. Save yourself the headache, Walmart has the Monster Premium HDMI cables @ $12. Very happy, even though its last years model........but the $1500 price tag saved me $700+.
customer_reviews.author: kirkdj

customer_reviews.title: We love Sony TVs
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Sony TV we bought from Amazon in the past decade. The first one is Sony 52” XBR HDTV and still runs great. This 75” gorgeous has been shining over 4 years now without any problem. I wrote a review on the first ones many years back to praise Sony’s superior service after they replaced the LCD screen for free even though the warranty expired. This was one of the reasons we chose Sony over other products. Best quality in class.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: No disappointment here!  Great experience.
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of free delivery and the picture is great! Lowered my cable bill since I can stream direct now. And, we opted for Amazon to come out and set it up. Third party, but the installer knew what he was doing. I doubt I'll ever go to BB for another tv. The TV is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during a Christmas sale on Amazon, and did not regret a thing! Excellent picture quality, especially when paired with our AppleTV 4k. 4k HDR is amazing!!! If you use Google Home, then this TV integrates well with that, too. I was even impressed with the overall sound quality, although we are going to pair this with our HomePods.
customer_reviews.author: AJD3

customer_reviews.title: Lazy TV refuses to work!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this TV new in June of 2019. Some days TV will not turn on unless I first unplug the unit and plug it back in. This is problematic as 1) TV is mounted high on wall 2) I paid $1000 for a brand new TV and it doesn’t work. After doing some research, I have found out this is a common problem with newer Sony TV’s. Sony suggested fixes such as updating to the most current software (I did) and plugging straight into the wall (it is). Picture is beautiful and the smart features are fine, but none of that matters if it won’t turn on. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: subpar image quality, cumbersome user interface and intermittent disconnection from wifi network
customer_reviews.text: the picture quality of this tv does not reach any heights. the edge light is obvious and the colors are not sharp. After switching from a Roku TV, the user interface of Sony-implemented android tv is a nightmare to use and completely disorganzed. Plus, the tv keeps disconnecting from our wifi network when all other wifi devices at home never had this problem - we have a premium wifi router. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kristjan

customer_reviews.title: Sony TV
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks much different from my old tv. Looks strange. Speakers are not the best. Would not recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow is it nice
customer_reviews.text: This TV is definitely big. Wow big. The colors are excellent. The software included is good. One item that is a bummer in my case is that I have Sonos Beam speaker as the sound bar and the speaker is just tall enough to obstruct the remote sensor on the TV :( so a workaround was needed. Other than this, it is an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: No local dimming can diminish low light quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a good picture but there is some light bleed in the blacks due to lack of local dimming. Nice in a bright room for the price!
customer_reviews.author: BajaRobster

customer_reviews.title: Poor packing 2 broken tvs
customer_reviews.text: Received 2 of these, first ine with a hole in the box, screen totally damaged, second one a hit on top. Tv seems great great size sony is neat with google home integrated. Poor packing and handling.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo C. Guzman Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Replaced older 52" Sony tv
customer_reviews.text: Clear, bright picture with accurate color reproduction. Sound quality from tv speakers is surprisingly good, but I also purchased Sony Z9F soundbar (HT-Z9F) and Sony Z9R wireless speakers (SA-Z9R) to enhance the overall tv watching experience.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decent....
customer_reviews.text: As great as this TV is, I have been extremely disappointed to learn (after purchase and install) that MLB TV app doesnt, and will never work on this and several other BRAVIA models. Other than that, couldn't be happier. But for the money I spent...kind of a big deal
customer_reviews.author: Saucey

customer_reviews.title: Quality TV at a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: We really love the picture quality of this TV. It works well in all lighting. The audio works well from the TV although I plan to hook into external speakers soon. We have it near a very bright sliding door and we never have issues with contrast. It also has so many great built in apps and features that work very fast. The remote is wonderful and seamlessly integrates with my Android device. The shipping and packaging was perfect and we have had zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great TV by Sony! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Built-in chromecast makes it so much easier. Excellent clarity in video and audio. TV watching experience feels complete. The packaging of the TV needs a special mention. It was padded well to avoid any cracks or breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Balaji

customer_reviews.title: The price was right!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is amazing!!! Or it's because I haven't owned a new tv set in over 12 years!! Anyway the picture is great and the price was right! Overall I'm happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: phillip c harris

customer_reviews.title: Stuttering and clouding problems
customer_reviews.text: This TV was a disappointment. The black levels are terrible, and it has significant clouding issues. But most frustrating has been stuttering problems with the streaming apps. ESPN and Fox Sports both were unwatchable from the get-go due to severe stuttering. Sony tech support tried to blame it on ESPN and Fox, which was baloney because those apps work fine on all other devices. Then, as the TV was just under a year old, the major entertainment apps started stuttering as well. I just ordered a Roku so I can bypass the preloaded apps entirely. This TV has major software issues.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Quality TV
customer_reviews.text: Quality TV but remote isn't the greatest (if you actually use one). The motion rate is very good for regular tv and sports aren't that bad, with the exception of Football. You will lose sight of the ball in crowd. Have watched a lot of 4K movies and great darks and lights.
customer_reviews.author: gregory r ball

customer_reviews.title: SONY failed
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality while it worked! Unfortunately this TV started to automatically start up and shut down after only 4 months of use! It has been connected to a high quality surge protector, so no excuses there. Bought SONY because of its reputation for quality...never again.
customer_reviews.author: SGT

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular Color And Brightness
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Sony TV after having been an exclusive Vizio user for fifteen years. It was very easy to set up and the manufatturer included many useful software add-ons, which make it much more than just a TV.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Heppe

customer_reviews.title: Sony TV
customer_reviews.text: After adjusting the picture to get the best color saturation and sharpest picture this is a great TV. I have bought Sony products for a long time and have yet to be disappointed with them. Took me awhile to pick this TV for all the research that I did. Going to Stores to look at product and compare between Samsung and Sony. Came down to my satisfaction with the Sony product line. Would recommended this TV to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV! I could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a TV this large. The biggest one I owned prior to this was 40 inches. It's basically like having my own movie theater in my bedroom. Movies, sporting events, and video games all look amazing. And the $1,800 I paid for it was an absolute steal considering the quality of this TV. I definitely recommend purchasing this TV before they run out! You will not find a better viewing experience anywhere. Thank you Sony!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great 4k experience!
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall! I enjoy the crsip look of the 4k HDR and the 1080p upscaling. Only thing i did not like was the IR blaster, it was kind of cheap and broke when I tried to set it up to my comcast box. But i dont really need that feature, so I gave it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Classic Sony picture, even better experience when you add a sound bar
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Sony in a bit more than a decade, and with all I’ve been 100% satisfied with the natural picture quality. The Android system is intuitive enough and all the main logins for streaming services was a snap. I already had a simple all-in-one Yamaha sound bar which integrated easily. The built in sound is okay but I think most users will be happier with even a fairly basic upgrade like I did.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ravage

customer_reviews.title: Poor wifi connection. Good picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: I would say after using a TV for more then half year I am regreting purchasing it. TV always loosing WiFi connection. I thought it may be my router but j recently changed it and still have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: VLAD

customer_reviews.title: Bright Corners
customer_reviews.text: Either it was damaged in transit or the corners are just 10 times brighter than the rest of the screen. Disappointing when you spend this much on a sony.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Sipes

customer_reviews.title: REMARKABLE
customer_reviews.text: This is the best TV ever! I did a lot of research before I purchased this. It exceeded every one of my expectations. Football is spectacular!
customer_reviews.author: HarVette

customer_reviews.title: All Great
customer_reviews.text: Apart from not loving the remote this TV is completely the best TV I have ever owned. Love Sony TVs and never the cheapest but always the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: hal wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV, But?
customer_reviews.text: Really like the TV. Easy to set up and start watching. Only negative TV set for awhile until I got moved to get it set up. Got everything laid out to began to install on stand... and no remote control in bag or box.
customer_reviews.author: OFFROAD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking TV
customer_reviews.text: TV is beautiful. I had a problem with the TV when it first came (the screen was cracked), but Amazon seamlessly had another one sent to my home (even before the broken one was picked up). Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Defective one HDMI
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this unit from amazon warehouse as returned unit and now I know why , since this TV has 4 HDMI terminals so far I only use 2 terminals and does work , excellent clarity and picture, I am always a Sony fan , contacted amazon customer service and they were very good in handling the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Ian O. Moquia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing’
customer_reviews.text: The 65in size of this TV is a statement to any room! The picture quality is a great difference to my old 40in Sony! It’s a game changer to Movie nights!
customer_reviews.author: Luis G Mares

customer_reviews.title: Great TV but remote is dead after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: So, got the TV 2 weeks ago, everything was working great but the remote died today. I contacted Amazon support and the only option they can offer is a partial refund to cover the cost of taking the remote to a repair shop! Amazing that you can spend this much money on a TV and can't even expect that it all works properly.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mussabir

customer_reviews.title: Sony has the pic quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing picture even on standard setting. 85 inch is good size and amazon delivery is very convenient. If you in market for big screen TV this should be on your shortlist.
customer_reviews.author: Tinks

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: My second Bravia and I'm a customer for life as far as my main TV in the house goes. It's a little cumbersome navigating through the smart features but the picture is amazing so its merely a slight inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hanney

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV! Sharp, clear image and good sound. I was able to install it on my own (not that I'm recommending doing so), but it would've gone easier with two.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great TV at a great Price
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up and great picture quality. This is my 6th Sony television. The rest don't even compare to SONY.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Foster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: This TV is truly amazing!! The picture is great and the things the Smart TV can do will blow your mind!
customer_reviews.author: gwen

customer_reviews.title: be carefull when moving a tv
customer_reviews.text: the tv was cracked so i can not give a rate.
customer_reviews.author: george kapsimallis

customer_reviews.title: A nice 4k tv for the money and big
customer_reviews.text: Well this is my third sony tv. This one is really nice, picture is great so far. Easy to use and set up. A very good looking tv.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G. Orochena

customer_reviews.title: THIS TV IS AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is wonderful - like you are night in the action. We had a 46" Bravia by Sony since 2008 that everyone commented how super the picture was and this one is just as good
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my 10 year old 55” Samsung LCD with this Sony 65” and I couldn’t be happier! Gorgeous picture quality and color. I love that it comes preloaded with Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. After much research, delivered exactly as expected. Amazon service was flawless
customer_reviews.author: James Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived with a cracked screen. Amazon quickly sent a replacement and it arrived alive. Excellent tv for the price. Great picture and am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: screen is scratched
customer_reviews.text: It's to big to return, I hired a guy to put it up and now i have to pay again to pack for the return? I will have to use scratched screen TV forever.
customer_reviews.author: buysforyou

customer_reviews.title: What a great TV
customer_reviews.text: I waited 6 months to write this to be positive. I have been a Sony TV lover for years and have always spent a little more for them. This one does not dissipoint!
customer_reviews.author: G T Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV. Sony’s are awesome. The only problem is the sound. You really do need a sound bar (or something similar) to hear it without blasting the volume.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful picture. The TV is everything we thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: P Mass

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted an XBR and this one does not disappoint. To get a better picture I would have had to spend north of 2k. Very Happy...
customer_reviews.author: Rodney J Fortner

customer_reviews.title: beautiful picture easy setup
customer_reviews.text: great picture and easy to setup. Many options in the apps for all your TV viewing desires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product - Sony XBR65X850F 65-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV at a cost of $1,401.84 in January of 2019 and less than a month started having problems with it. Pictures will not show and now it looks like I paid for a lemon TV.
customer_reviews.author: pokweye

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TV EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Everything makes me appreciate every penny that I spent on this TV. However, android tv seems a little bit slow and laggy, but still, you do not have to buy more stuff to watch something on your TV.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Basha

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice TV
customer_reviews.text: I like the picture quality but I do not like the sound
customer_reviews.author: Robert Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality of tv
customer_reviews.text: I’m satisfied on everything except the remote control which is a little bit complicated for me
customer_reviews.author: Imelda

customer_reviews.title: Best overall picture clarity.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are typical of Sony's true colors. I am using this TV in the family room and can read everything on the screen without glasses. I am so glad that I chose this size TV because it is an enhanced viewing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good TV for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely great TV. Common it's a Sony. The only thing is the remote control shoud be renovated since it looks like it hasn't been changed since 90's.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Kraynitsky

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer!
customer_reviews.text: Just received an hour ago. Delivery was smooth, drivers setup TV and took boxes with them. I'm thrilled with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Big is better!
customer_reviews.text: Loving it, quality is great. Also playing Playstaion 4 on this TV is an awesome experience.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: No longer works after a year and warranty is gone
customer_reviews.text: After owning this item for a little less than a year, the TV picture completely stops work. I can still hear the sounds from the TV, but all picture has gone away. It's also sad to say there's no warranty offered for this past 5 months so I am left with a non-working TV.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Huang

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, worth the premium you pay
customer_reviews.text: Used this as one of the three TV’s in my media room. Looks and works great. Excellent picture and the features are intuitive. If you have other Sony products chances are they will have features that intertwine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: We've had our Sony TV for 8 months. No problems. Great picture! Sound quality is very good, however it seems a bit dependent on where you sit. Ours is connected to cable, and it's easy to hear, even on low volume.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Was not 'like new'!
customer_reviews.text: I really sorry that I got the product in so bad shape, I agree with some damage 'in the box' but not in the product itself. The TV had a big bent in the corner with a long scratch until the middle of the screen. It was not 'like new'.
customer_reviews.author: G. Camilo

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Great picture even from non-had source. Soundbar obstructs the remote control, that’s the only complaint I have. Compared to the external sound system, sound quality is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Green Family

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: I orederd two 65"s and one 55" absolutely love them. Delivery can be better but overall easy process great products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best TV in it's class
customer_reviews.text: There are of course better TVs out there, but for the price point I bought it at and what it was compared to at that level it was hands down the best option, and since getting it setup it lives up to every expectation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Top left hand portion of screen is much darker than the rest of the thing. It was either a refurb or a jungle model. Either way I'm unhappy and miserable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. It met all expectations. I ordered a sound bar as well and they work great together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forget Samsung, buy Sony.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time, or money on a Samsung. This is by far the best television, user controls, picture quality, online capabilities, are much better than my Samsung. Will be a Sony customer from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pratt

customer_reviews.title: the television did not work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv however when i got it the tv did not work and I had to return it. It has taken over 3 weeks to return and I have not received my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Elizalde

customer_reviews.title: Couch shopping yeah
customer_reviews.text: What an easy way to buy, pay for and receive a new tv
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda L. Lee & Al Lee

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Sony quality.
customer_reviews.text: Will be a year in June and I only use it when I’m not working or in college. Today a dead pixel appeared in the middle of the screen. I can only imagine what would happen if I had used it more frequently. How I have to figure out what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture and great value
customer_reviews.text: Like: great picture! Good value Dislike: nothing yet (after 1 month)
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV ; Glad I did not get a bigger one. this one is perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Must own
customer_reviews.text: The picture and colors are the best. The sound from the speakers are not great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Hand

customer_reviews.title: Always ride with Sony
customer_reviews.text: All Sony products works the best for me because I'm a gamer and tech geek. Thumbs up for creating the best product.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had the tv for about a month now and so far so good. I aslo have a 55" Sony and love them both. Great picture quality!

customer_reviews.title: Seeing is believing the XBR will not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding picture quality works flawlessly with streaming Netflix and Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Broken tv
customer_reviews.text: Garbage tv, shuts off automatically randomly after 8 months of owning it. Who’s gonna unmount a tv and ship it back for customer service

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, works great with all the streaming apps!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV in hopes of being able to see sports and movies better and it has paid off.

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the money.... but definitely not top of the line
customer_reviews.text: Good picture and sound for the TV itself... but the interface and the response from the remote control is a real drag
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Adam Pena

customer_reviews.title: Love the picture
customer_reviews.text: Love Sony because you can hook up earphones and speakers. Picture is so much clearer and love the 4K
customer_reviews.author: Janice Sheppard

product_meta.title: Sony XBR75X850F 75-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV
product_meta.description: Size:75 inches| Style:TVBeautiful scenery comes to life with the 4K HDR X1 Processor and TRILUMINOS Display in the X850F 4K HDR TV. Lifelike detail is revealed in your favorite entertainment with Dynamic Contrast Enhancement and 4K HDR Super Bit Mapping, displaying contrast and color gradation in stunning accuracy. It doesn’t just display content, it evokes emotion.
feature_bullets: 4K ULTRA HD: 4K Resolution with High Dynamic Range for incredible detail, brightness, and clarity
LIFELIKE CONTRAST: Take non-HDR content to the next level with the X1 processor and 4K X-Reality Pro
VIBRANT COLORS: Enjoy rich, natural colors with TRILUMINOS display and 4K HDR Super Bit Mapping
CATCH THE ACTION: Motionflow XR technology gives you on-screen action with virtually no motion blur
GENIUS TV: Our 75” Android TV with Google Assistant is compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Home
INPUTS: 4 HDMI inputs, 2 USB 2.0, 1 USB 3.0, and 1 composite input; includes hidden cable holder
INCLUDES: Smart remote, batteries, power cord spec, IR Blaster, instructions, setup guide and stand
DIMENSIONS: TV with stand - 65 7/8” x 40 5/8” x 14 5/8”; TV without stand - 65 7/8” x 38” x 2 1/4”

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars296 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
